title: Mastery Deleted with new patch?? ðŸ”§
body: Does anyone else have this issue after the latest patch i no longer have any mastery on any champions yet my profile still displays my 3 highest mastery champions? anyone else have the same issue

replies.body: Looks like this may have been just a visual glitch. Let me know if you're still having any issues!
Having the same problem, pls fix
Yes same thing happen to me , hopefully we can get this post more viability so riot sees
